lines.text: Force exerted by something that connects

definitions.def: Force applied by a string, cord, rope, chain, etc.

secText: This string is pulling upward on the block.  That force is called tension, and it always acts in a direction away from the object, along the string.
To keep things simple, we assume that strings, ropes, and so on, do not stretch.  And we commonly ignore the mass of the string, rope, etc., when solving problems.
